author: cbs8
title: Praise From the G20 Journal: Turkey is the Star of Rising Markets and the Region
text:
Global Connection Media S.A.
ISTANBUL , October 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
The tenth annual G20 Leaders Summit, a platform which brings together the 20 developed countries of the world, will be held in Antalya between 15-16 November 2015 . " G2O in Turkey " , the official publication of the summit covering the events, has begun to reach readers from the foremost countries around the globe. Published by the international media company Global Connection (GC) with contributions from worldwide journalists, "G20 in Turkey " has variously described Turkey as the "star of rising markets and the region", "an exemplar of a prospering economy", and "the most dynamic country among the G20".
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278433 )
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278434LOGO )
"G20 in Turkey " which is published with Le Figaro in France , Die Welt and Welt Kompakt in Germany , The Daily Telegraph in the UK. Komsomolskaya Pravda and Kommersant in Russia , and Gulf News in the UAE also features statements by President of the Republic of Turkey Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Deputy Prime Minister Cevdet Yilmaz, will be reaching 55 million readers.
Among the many interesting contributions featured in "G20 in Turkey ", "Topkapi Palace: The abode of Sultans", "TÃ¼nel at Istanbul : The world's second oldest subway", "Meet the new brand of Turkey : Turkey , Discover the Potential" and "The Turkish Nobel laureate scientist Aziz Sancar " were noteworthy articles.
In a statement given to "G20 in Turkey ", President Recep Tayyip Erdogan underlined the fact that all attendant countries of the G20 were acting in unison regarding world crises, adding that "[they] must make the best of this mutual concurrence in relieving future global problems".
Stating that during its 2015 presidency Turkey will be focusing on the themes of "implementation, investments and comprehensiveness", Erdogan added; "We believe that the means towards a strong economic development, both locally and on a worldwide scale, is through the implementation of stability and confidence. To this end, commitments should be thoroughly met. As members of the G20, if we carry out the development strategies we adopted last year, we expect an additional 2,1 percent development by 2018."
The first issue of "G20 in Turkey ", the official publication of G20, has been published on 17 October together with The Daily Telegraph in the UK, subsequently on 19 October with Komsomolskaya Pravda and Kommersant in Russia , with Gulf News in the UAE, with Die Welt and Welt Kompakt in Germany , on 20 October with Le Figaro in France and on important online sites such as http://www.kp.ru , http://www.welt.de and http://www.lemonde.fr .
